attribute.name.extraspellattributes.conv: Attack Damage gained as Fire Power
Fire Power Attribute gained as Attack Damage
Attack Damage gained as Arcane Power
Arcane Power Attribute gained as Attack Damage
Attack Damage gained as Frost Power
Frost Power Attribute gained as Attack Damage
Attack Damage gained as Healing Power
attribute.name.extraspellattributes.glan: Chance for Damage Received to be Mitigated by 35%
attribute.name.extraspellattributes.spel: Chance for Spells Received to Deal 50% Less Damage
attribute.name.extraspellattributes.sere: Chance for Halved Received Spells to Instead Deal No Damage (Max 75%)
enchantment.extraspellattributes.suppres: Increases your chance to suppress spell damage by 4% per level. Suppressed spells deal 50% less damage.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.defianc: +0.25 damage taken ignored per level. Has diminishing returns.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.spellbr: Increases your chance to ignore suppressed spell damage by 4% per level. Maximum of 75%.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.glancin: Increases your chance to receive a glancing blow by 4% per level. A glancing blow deals 35% less damage.
enchantment.extraspellattributes.battler: +4% damage to your life is regenerated over the next four seconds per level.
attribute.name.extraspellattributes.dete: Damage to Health Recovered as Health Over the Next 4 Seconds
desc.extraspellattributes.glance: A Glancing Blow deals only 65% damage. You cannot receive Glancing Blows from damage that doesn't come from an entity (Such as Fire and Poison).
desc.extraspellattributes.supp: A Suppressed Spell deals only 50% damage.
desc.extraspellattributes.defi: Your Defiance subtracts its total from the total damage you take. Defiance has diminishing returns.
desc.extraspellattributes.acro: Your % Spellbreak is the chance that a suppressed spell instead deals no damage. Spellbreak caps at 75%.
desc.extraspellattributes.determination: Your % Determination is the proportion of health lost that regenerates back over the next four seconds.
desc.extraspellattributes.reabsorption: You regenerate Absorption (Yellow Hearts) up to your maximum Reabsorption gradually after not being hit for 4 seconds.
